channel.title: London Evening Standard | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/eveningstandard

item.title: Greater Manchester’s night-tim
item.description: Greater Manchester’s night-time economy adviser Sacha Lord urged Maldron Hotels to ‘do the right thing’.

item.title: The 'landmark' Paralympic Game
item.description: The 'landmark' Paralympic Games kick off tonight #frontpage From wheelchair racers to long jumpers with hardly any sight, it takes more than just athleticism to compete in the marvel that is the Paralympics. Read some of the most inspiring stories from Team GB: https://www.standard.co.uk/.../grit-humour-resilience...

item.title: An amber alert remains in plac
item.description: An amber alert remains in place after stocks of O negative and O positive blood fell to ‘unprecedentedly low levels’ in July
